statements: SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returned_products;
SELECT return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_status='Approved';
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC, return_reason ASC;
SELECT product_id, return_status FROM returned_products WHERE return_status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_status IN ('Approved', 'Rejected') AND return_reason LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM returned_products;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluation_data WHERE evaluation_score > 3;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM evaluation_data WHERE evaluation_score < 2 ORDER BY return_reason ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM returned_products GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01' AND return_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT evaluation_id, return_reason, evaluation_score FROM evaluation_data WHERE evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as return_count FROM returned_products GROUP BY customer_id HAVING return_count > 3;
SELECT r.product_id, e.evaluation_score FROM returned_products r INNER JOIN evaluation_data e ON r.product_id = e.product_id ORDER BY e.evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT * FROM ProductEvaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, returned_date FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE returned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM ProductEvaluation GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, returned_date FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts ORDER BY returned_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, evaluation_score FROM ReturnedProducts INNER JOIN ProductEvaluation ON ReturnedProducts.id = ProductEvaluation.product_id;
SELECT returned_product_id, analysis_category, analysis_result FROM ReturnedProductsAnalysis WHERE analysis_result != 'pending' ORDER BY returned_product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returned FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE return_reason = 'Faulty';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM ReturnedCustomers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM ReturnLocations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email FROM ReturnedCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM ReturnLocations WHERE country = 'USA';

SELECT product_name, return_reason, location_name FROM ReturnedProducts JOIN ReturnAnalysis ON ReturnedProducts.id = ReturnAnalysis.product_id JOIN ReturnLocations ON ReturnAnalysis.return_location_id = ReturnLocations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT return_date, customer_id, feedback FROM ReturnsHistory;
SELECT product_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM AnalysisData;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE returned_quantity > 10 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, return_date, feedback FROM Products INNER JOIN ReturnsHistory ON Products.product_id = ReturnsHistory.product_id WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM Products INNER JOIN AnalysisData ON Products.product_id = AnalysisData.product_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
